alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Fayette; Haywood; Lauderdale; Obion; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 2:44AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Crockett, Tipton, Dyer, northwestern Fayette, south central Obion, Lauderdale, western Haywood and Shelby Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Heloise to near Dixonville to near T O Fuller State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Dyersburg, Millington, Covington, Ripley, T O Fuller State Park, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Fort Pillow State Park, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Newbern, Brighton, Halls, Obion and Southwest Memphis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern Arkansas...northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Crockett; Dyer; Fayette; Haywood; Lauderdale; Obion; Shelby; Tipton
